value.title: DAX Fridays! #23: ISFILTERED

value.title: DAX Fridays! #29: HASONEVALUE
value.excerpt: Have you ever got this error message?: A table of multiple values was supplied where a single value was expected ? If you have seasonal business and you want to analyze what happended the same period the previous year, it will do it flowless.
